venue.address_1: 10 Brookline Street, Central Square T stop
venue.name: TT the Bear's

item.description:
Join us for a night of live J-Pop/J-Rock music brought to you by Japan Nite. This is a once-a-year event where we get to see a total of six Japanese bands perform in one night. You don't need to fly to Japan for this and it's only 12 bucks. How can anyone miss this deal?! ...unless, you prefer to get wasted at a crowded Irish bar which I can completely understand. After all it IS an Irish holiday on Japan Nite. Just keep in mind that you can get just as wasted at the venue, with a cooler crowd ;-) We will be hanging out near the pool table room between shows.

As for the lineup this year, I don't know all the bands but I know Detroit 7 alone is worth checking out for. Below is the schedule. check the venue's site for directions and here is more info on Japan Nite. Hope to see you there!

The Beaches
Midnight
The Emeralds
11:15pm
Detroit 7
10:30pm
Ketchup Mania
9:45pm
Petty Booka
9:00pm
Scandal
8:15pm
item.name: Japan Nite 2008
